templates.name: PHP FPM
templates.description:
Get PHP-FPM metrics using Zabbix agent running on Linux.

This template is meant to be used with https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-nginx-php-fpm

items.name: PHP-FPM: Accepted connections per second
items.description: The number of accepted requests per second.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Listen queue
items.description: The current number of connections that have been initiated, but not yet accepted.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Listen queue, len
items.description: Size of the socket queue of pending connections.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Listen queue, max
items.description: The maximum number of requests in the queue of pending connections since this FPM pool has started.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Queue usage
items.description: Queue utilization

triggers.name: PHP-FPM: Queue utilization is high (over {$PHP_FPM.QUEUE.WARN.MAX}% for 15m)
triggers.description: The queue for this pool reached {$PHP_FPM.QUEUE.WARN.MAX}% of its maximum capacity. Items in queue represent the current number of connections that have been initiated on this pool, but not yet accepted.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Max children reached
items.description: The number of times that pm.max_children has been reached since the php-fpm pool started

items.name: PHP-FPM: Pool name
items.description: The name of current pool.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Processes, active
items.description: The total number of active processes.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Processes, idle
items.description: The total number of idle processes.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Processes, max active
items.description: The highest value that 'active processes' has reached since the php-fpm server started.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Processes, total
items.description: The total number of server processes currently running.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Process manager
items.description: The method used by the process manager to control the number of child processes for this pool.

triggers.name: PHP-FPM: Manager  changed (new value received: {ITEM.VALUE})
triggers.description: PHP-FPM manager changed. Ack to close.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Slow requests
items.description: The number of requests that exceeded your request_slowlog_timeout value.

triggers.name: PHP-FPM: Detected slow requests
triggers.description: PHP-FPM detected slow request. A slow request means that it took more time to execute than expected (defined in the configuration of your pool).

items.name: PHP-FPM: Start time
items.description: The time when this pool was started.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Uptime
items.description: How long has this pool been running.

triggers.name: PHP-FPM: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 30m)
triggers.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes

items.name: PHP-FPM: CPU utilization
items.description: Process CPU utilization percentage.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Memory usage, %
items.description: Memory used percentage relative to total memory available.

items.name: PHP-FPM: Memory usage (rss)
items.description: Resident set size memory used by process in bytes.

macros.description: Hostname or IP of PHP-FPM status host or container.
The port of PHP-FPM status host or container.
The maximum PHP-FPM queue usage percent for trigger expression.
The path of PHP-FPM status page.
